sub_title: Technical Service Engineer Hydrocracking Shell Catalyst & Technologies

profile_positions.description: The 01st off June started my new role as Technical Service Engineer Hydrocracking with Shell Catalyst & Technologies.
profile_positions.title: Technical Service Engineer Hydrocracking

profile_positions.description:
Working for 5 production locations in NAM Production unit South West. In PU South West there are 5 main production locations producing 2000knm3/d natural gas an 400m3/d crude.
In that perspective the main focal point in the area for eMOC (Management off change process), MTO (Manage treat and opportunities) ( FIT4) and for ESP ( Ensure safe production)
Organizing and leading ESP days to determine the cumulative risk per production location, reduction of alarms to ESP standards, trip investigation to increase reliability.
Managing medium and long term treats and opportunities through the MTO process.
Troubleshooting with more complex problems in the production.
In the Emoc process the owner of the permanent Emoc's with the responsibility to screen and implement the changes that are initiated.
Part off the asset leadership team of NAM Production unit South West.
I'm also a TA 3 (technical authority level 3) in operations.
profile_positions.title: Senior Production Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Working both as shift supervisor and as production specialist in NAM production unit West.
As shift supervisor responsible for 10 shift operators and the production of 5 natural gas productions units and 1 oil location.
The production specialist role was in that time a new role in NAM. Responsible for production excellence.
profile_positions.title: Senior Production Specialist and shift supervisor

profile_positions.description:
Working in the reliability and second line operational support group of NAM Asset Land leading several second line support request. Participated in RCA ( Route cause analyses) sessions and also facilitated several RCA’s.
During RCA process, evaluating if programmed maintenance is adequate and challenged against low medium or high value plants.
When handling second line operational support leading a team of experts to solve operational or maintenance issues.
Leading Alarm review sessions for operational excellence 
Participated in the ORIP (Operational Reliability and integrity process) process and also lead a few ORIP sessions on request.

Responsible for setting changes and using setting change procedure and last year through the eMOC process.
Participated in several IPF studies and alarm rationalization studies. 

As operational support engineer responsible for plantchanges, operating manuals, alarm reviews and setting changes.

Participated in pre start up audits as process engineer to determine the statement of fitness in upstream units.
profile_positions.title: Reliability and secondline operational support Engineer at NAM

profile_positions.description:
As technical service Engineer for Criterion responsible for winning new business and retaining business in Eastern Europe and Middle East in hydro treating service Like Diesel, Kero, Naphtha and Cat feed hydro treaters. (Ultra low sulphur Diesel, Cat feed hydro treating and Top bed grading). 
In Eastern Europe and the Middle East region managing the technical part of the sales activities for diesel/kero/naphtha and catfeed hydro treaters providing technical proposals for new catalyst sales and the technical support involving Start up support, loading support, unit monitoring and troubleshooting during catalyst cycle life.
Working close with customers setting up start up procedures and getting the most value out of the catalyst for the refinery to increase their margin growth.
Looking for options of better catalyst utilization by installing the Shell HD-internals to increase cycle length or processing heavier feedstocks.
Leading pilot plant testing for customers. Setting up and responsible for executing and reporting of tailor made pilot plant tests in diesel/kero/naphta treating, hydrocracking and VGO treating.
Performed studies for topbed optimization to reduce the pressure drop in the reactor due to fouling.
Working close with the third party research labs to improve their pilot plant testing. Advisor on pilot plants design.
profile_positions.title: Technical Service Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Evaluate performance of refinery catalysts (for distillate HDS and dewaxing and VGO hydro cracking) for catalyst development, and for application technical service, involving: 
Design and execution of trickle flow experiments, to address the issue at hand.
Evaluation, interpretation and reporting of results.
Trouble shooting, maintaining, and complete revamping of trickle flow units.
profile_positions.title: Senior Technical Assosiate in pilotplant testing

profile_positions.description:
Involved with the introduction of the self steering teams at the RHP department off the Pernis site. 
Did the daily planning of the maintenance activities as (Beheerder in dagdienst) BID.
Evaluated the work processes when introducing the self steering teams.
Did a few turn around at the Shell Gasification Plant in operation for the Gassifiers
Worked as a Head operator on the Gasification and Hydrogen plant SGHP at Pernis.
Prepared and organized a catalyst change out of the CO shift unit at the SGHP in Pernis.
As operator anticipated in the first shutdown at the SGHP and also did a few gassifier shutdowns 
Prepared a few shutdowns on the following departments in Pernis as an Operational assistant (RWZ, CWZ, SARU).
As operational assistant also replaced the shift supervisor during his absence on the following departments in Pernis (RWZ, CWZ, and SARU).
Panel operator at the Sooth ash removal unit, Refinery water treatment and Chemical water treatment plants. 
Involved in the commissioning and start up at the SARU unit in operations.
profile_positions.title: Operations

profile_positions.description:
Maintenance of QMI equipment online equipment and also Laboratory analyzers at the pernis refinery.
Implemented new on line GLC's for online product measurement at the RDU department at Pernis.
Prepared and anticipated in a few shutdowns QMI related
profile_positions.title: QMI specialist
